researches.title: Client X — Content Strategy Test
researches.goal: Identify the most effective hooks for the niche to drive view time and inquiries.
researches.method: Research 50 hooks; select the top 3 by performance; write scripts; post for 1 month.
researches.result: TBD — track views, watch time, CTR, and inquiries weekly.
